patient_info: Urinary hesitancy,Nephrolithiasis,Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy,Pericardial effusion,Left ventricular hypertrophy,Abnormal thrombosis,Pneumonia,Pulmonary arterial hypertension,Dyspnea,Hypokalemia,Conjugated hyperbilirubinemia,Exercise intolerance,Increased total bilirubin,Atrial fibrillation,Right ventricular dilatation,Abnormal T-wave,Ventricular septal hypertrophy,Tricuspid regurgitation,Premature ventricular contraction,Pedal edema,Right bundle branch block,Reduced left ventricular ejection fraction,Regional left ventricular wall motion abnormality,Left ventricular diastolic dysfunction,Right atrial enlargement,Abnormal B-type natriuretic peptide concentration,Productive cough,Left atrial enlargement,Dysuria,Chest pain
